meanings.definition: A device used to separate or combine signals in a communication system.
meanings.sent1: The duplexers helped improve the quality of the phone calls.
meanings.sent2: The technician installed the duplexers to enhance the radio transmission.
meanings.sent3: The duplexers decided to mix up the signals just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The duplexers acted like traffic controllers for the communication signals.
meanings.sent5: The duplexers were like magic gates for the messages traveling through the system.
